titleStmt.title: By the Major General of the Parliaments forces in Ireland, with the advice of the Council of Officers.
titleStmt.author: Waller, Hardress, Sir, 1604?-1666?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library (Dublin, Ireland).

With: A true and exact coppy of the several articles (together with the form of the abjuration of the Protestant religion; and confession of the Romish) imposed upon the French Protestants: / taken from the original, in the hands of Bonaventure le Brun, notary publick of Roüen: Now faithfully translated into English, and published for general satisfaction. Dublin : Printed for John Bentley over against the Four Courts door in Christ-Church-yard., 1685.
